user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a shopping cart on Amazon with a subtotal of $834.97 for three items. The items include a Logitech G933 Artemis Spectrum headset priced at $139.99 and an Apple MacBook Pro for $554.99. There are options to delete items, save them for later, or compare them with similar items. Additionally, there's a checkbox to send items as a gift and proceed to checkout.
